trans-unit.source: Represents event data for the <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.WebControls.QueryableDataSource.QueryCreated" /> event.
trans-unit.target: Representa os dados de evento para o evento <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.WebControls.QueryableDataSource.QueryCreated" />.
O objeto de consulta a ser usado.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.QueryCreatedEventArgs" /> class using an <see cref="T:System.Linq.IQueryable`1" /> query object.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.QueryCreatedEventArgs" /> usando um objeto de consulta <see cref="T:System.Linq.IQueryable`1" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <see cref="T:System.Linq.IQueryable`1" /> object to use for the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.QueryCreatedEventArgs" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o <see cref="T:System.Linq.IQueryable`1" /> a ser usado para a classe <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.QueryCreatedEventArgs" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Linq.IQueryable`1" /> object to use for the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.QueryCreatedEventArgs" /> class.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Linq.IQueryable`1" /> objeto a ser usado para o <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.QueryCreatedEventArgs" /> classe.
